ullwyn was a sailing merchant-mage who lived centuries before the 13 century DR.
Gullwyn was the creator of the famous blade called the Dagger of Safe Harbor, an enchanted blade that protected its wielder from all harm. In his long sailors career Gullwyn witnessed countless men being swept off the ships during deadly storms all because of a split second of fear. In the years that followed the weapons creation, the Dagger of Safe Harbor saved Gullwyns life on at least three occasions.
